name: Shengong "Kuang" Pickaxe
description: The Shengong "Kuang" Pickaxe is the Workshop equivalent of a Steel Pickaxe , allowing Prospectors to mine higher tier metals ( Aluminium Ore , Platinum Ore , etc) at earlier stages of a Prospect while increasing yield.
crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench
